issuerProfile.organizationType: Community center, Local Mental Health Authority (LMHA), Local Behavioral Health Authority (LBHA), Local Intellectual and Developmental Disability Authority (LIDDA), Unit of local government (Texas Health and Safety Code Chapters 533 & 534)
issuerProfile.scope: Provides mental health and intellectual/developmental disability services in Tarrant County and surrounding areas.
issuerProfile.scale: Over 100 site locations, serving over 65,000 people annually, with more than 2,000 employees.
certifications: Commission on Accreditation of Rehabilitation Facilities (CARF) accredited
issuerProfile.procurementGoal: Strives for best value, not necessarily the lowest proposal.

timeline.proposalValidity: Irrevocable offer valid for 120 calendar days after proposal opening.
timeline.anticipatedAwardDate: Contingent upon Committee and/or Board Approval (approx. 60 days post-deadline)

bidderEligibility.experience: Minimum three (3) years of business in Temporary Staffing Services at the time of bid due date.
bidderEligibility.preProposalConference: Mandatory attendance required for all vendors submitting a bid.
bidderEligibility.financialStability: Must demonstrate financial stability (Annual Report, CPA Solvency Letter, etc.).
bidderEligibility.compliance: Must comply with all specified legal, insurance, and procedural requirements.

scopeOfWork.serviceRequested: Provide temporary employees of indefinite quantities on an as-needed, non-exclusive basis.
scopeOfWork.contractType: Hourly rate based. MHMR may award multiple contracts (non-exclusive). No guarantee of work.
scopeOfWork.positions: Includes categories like Administrative, Medical, Caretaker, Finance, Accounting, Patient Financial Services, Credentialing, IT, and Legal Support Services. Specific positions listed in Proposal Form (Section 11), list not exhaustive.
scopeOfWork.placement: Direct placement on an as-needed basis. Ability to respond quickly to requests.
scopeOfWork.tempToHire: Temps eligible for permanent hire by MHMR after 520 hours at no additional charge.

specificRequirements.candidateQualification: Pre-qualify candidates based on education, skill-level, professionalism, flexibility, communication.
specificRequirements.workerStandards: Workers must be >= 18 years old, sober, reliable, clean, appropriately dressed, able to follow instructions.
specificRequirements.backgroundChecks: Contractor must conduct background checks; MHMR reserves right to conduct additional checks or request copies.
specificRequirements.prohibitions: No firearms, weapons, drugs, or alcohol allowed on MHMR premises by temporary employees.
specificRequirements.timesheets: Provide timesheets, completed weekly, approved by MHMR supervisor, attached to invoices.
specificRequirements.invoicing: Separate invoices per employee; include correct rates, position, start/end dates. Invoice weekly, bi-weekly, or monthly. Payment terms Net 30 minimum.
specificRequirements.pricing: Provide Hourly Rate paid to temp, Billing Percentage, and Billed Hourly Rate. Decreases in pay rate must lower bill rate; increases in pay rate do not increase the proposed bill rate.
specificRequirements.projectManagement: Assign a dedicated Project Manager for MHMR account.
specificRequirements.safety: Contractor responsible for safety, injury, and health of its personnel on MHMR property.
specificRequirements.keys: Return all keys upon assignment completion; Contractor bears cost of re-keying if keys are lost/not returned.
specificRequirements.mileageParking: MHMR will not reimburse mileage or parking.

complianceRequirements.legal: Comply with all State, Federal, Local Laws (incl. ADA, Title VII, ADEA, CRA 1991).
complianceRequirements.payrollTaxes: Contractor responsible for payroll, deductions, taxes, insurance, wages, benefits for its employees.
complianceRequirements.immigration: Comply with Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986. Use E-Verify if required by funding source.
complianceRequirements.hubMwDbe: Make good faith effort to utilize HUBs and M/W/DBEs (submit certificates or Attachment A).
complianceRequirements.assignment: No direct or indirect assignment of contract without MHMR approval.
complianceRequirements.licensure: Provide copies of relevant licenses, certifications, permits.
texasSpecific: No Boycotting Israel certification (TX Gov Code).
No Prohibited Business Operations certification (Sudan, Iran, Terrorist Orgs - TX Gov Code).

insurance.submission: Proof of insurance (current COI) MUST be submitted WITH the proposal.
insurance.uponAward: Provide COI naming MHMR, its officers, employees, and elected representatives as additional insured.
insurance.notice: 30-day written notice prior to termination or material alteration of policy.
insurance.provisions: Waiver of subrogation against MHMR. Ensure subcontractors meet requirements.

complianceRequirements.indemnification: Contractor must indemnify and hold harmless MHMR from suits, actions, claims, costs arising from contractor's negligence or wrongful acts.

proposalSubmission.format: 8.5x11, bound/stapled/binder, Table of Contents, numbered pages, tabbed sections.
proposalSubmission.copies: Original signed proposal AND one electronic copy (Flash Drive).
proposalSubmission.delivery: Mail or hand-deliver in a sealed envelope.
proposalSubmission.address: MHMR Procurement Services, Attn: Randall Elder, 3840 Hulen Street, Suite 538, Fort Worth, TX 76107
proposalSubmission.deadline: Must be received by February 27, 2025, 2:00 PM.
proposalSubmission.envelopeMarking: RFP 25-008 TEMPORARY SERVICES DO NOT OPEN UNTIL THURSDAY, FEBRUARY 27, 2025, AT 2:00 P.M.
proposalSubmission.signing: Must be signed in ink by an authorized representative. Unsigned proposals are rejected.

criteria.details: Completeness, thoroughness, understanding of project, technical aspects.

criteria.category: B. Qualifications, Experience and Past Performances
criteria.details: Similar work history, references, org chart/resumes, industry knowledge, employee vs. sub ratio, staff retention.

criteria.category: C. Compatibility of Staffing Plan with MHMR Specifications
criteria.details: Reliability, consistency, management/supervision plan, scope understanding, methodology.

criteria.points: Not explicitly assigned points, but total must reach 100 (Note: Points listed A-D sum to 80).

evaluationCriteria.process: Evaluation based on submitted proposal. MHMR may request oral presentations or a Best and Final Offer (BAFO).

requiredForms: Tabbed Proposal Sections (Cover Letter, Exec Summary, Company Info, Financials, References/Attachments, Scope, Literature, Pricing)
Attachment A: HUB/DBE Utilization Assessment (If applicable, or indicate None)
Attachment C: Deviation Form (MUST be signed and submitted, even if no deviations)
Attachment D: Non-Collusion Affidavit (MUST be completed, notarized, and submitted)
notes: Vendors who do not intend to bid should submit Attachment B - Notice 'No Bid' Form.
